this_title: Katy Perry: Making of the Pepsi Super Bowl Halftime Show
trans_title: Katy Perry:2015超级碗中场秀幕后制作
introduction: A behind-the-scenes documentary pieced together from over 100 hours of footage showing not just the preparation that went into Katy Perry's Super Bowl performance but the nerve it took to pull off such a massive, career-defining performance.
chinese_title: Katy Perry:2015超级碗中场秀幕后制作
foreign_title: Katy Perry: Making of the Pepsi Super Bowl Halftime Show
